title: The Premier League
summary: Led the site's comprehensive rebranding in late 2023, encompassing design overhauls across all pages.* Implemented new features with a focus on enhancing the Match Centre functionality and overall site performance and readability.* Developed key pages independently, including the Awards Page and Man of the Match Page, ensuring seamless integration with existing site architecture and design standards.* Contributed to the design and full-stack development of various small-scale features, such as promotional campaigns for new Premier League initiatives and features, enhancing user engagement and site usability.* Engaged in ongoing bug fixing and support for Business As Usual (BAU) tasks, maintaining site stability and performance.
